description.narrative: Girls, boys, adolescents and women of reproductive age receive services for the prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Early Childhood Development, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Adolescent girls and boys, mothers and fathers, and community leaders in 106 districts adopt 11 key life-saving, care and protective behaviours for children and women

description.narrative: UNICEF focus on Prevention of Stunting through IYCF was enhanced through community health network including more than 2,200 Community health workers and 21,175 active volunteers in 263 districts of Yemen. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:17/01/2021
